article:
Over the last 400
years, the Roman Catholic Jesuit order has established a worldwide network of
schools and universities. This is an incomplete list of notable alumni of these
institutions.

NOTE: Along with lay men and women, and non-Catholics, included in the list
      below are also a number of Jesuits. All members of the Jesuits, including
      many notable enough for Wiki entries but not listed below, are in fact
      alumni of Jesuit educational institutions.
categories: Lists of people by university or college|Jesuit educational institutions
